articles.description: Has Apple or Google suddenly uploaded a COVID-19 tracking app to your phone without asking first? Let's look closer at the claim that's spreading across social media.
articles.content:
What's that COVID-19 tracking 'app' that's suddenly appeared on your Android or iPhone device?

articles.title: Jony Ive disagreed with Apple's AR and VR plans - TechSpot
articles.description: For years Apple has been exploring ways to combine virtual reality and augmented reality into devices that are easy to use and as impactful as the original iPhone was to the mobile industry. A new report from Bloomberg details the…
articles.content: Rumor mill: Most if not all Apple products released in the recent past had to go through former design chief Jony Ive. But according to new information, in the case of AR and VR, the company wanted t… [+3054 chars]
